ai-tika-abh08t20:2_0: the eight knowledges arise for them, and the knowledge of the ending of defilements.
ai-tika-abh08t20:3_0: are called ‘one who knows the truth’.
ai-tika-abh08t20:4_0: This knowledge is called ‘accomplishment’. It is the name of the truth’, and so on.
ai-tika-abh08t20:5_0: equanimity as a finger-snap. They condemn from the armpits of (volitional) processes, from the generation of (volitional) processes, from the generation of (volitional) processes, from the uninterrupted knowledge, and from the next world of the next.
ai-tika-abh08t20:6_0: The great Bodhisatta thus spoke about the time (the truths); the Udasāla address (the Buddha), having spoken about the states of an arrivals of the Bodhi tree, (the earth) which is carried out to give rise to the yellow position, and this is called the great Seer.
ai-tika-abh08t20:6_1: the dispensation of the truth that arose from the Gotama of Saccaka.
ai-tika-abh08t20:8_0: Such is the defeat of this Dhamma.
ai-tika-abh08t20:9_0: The Teaching of the Practice Concentration is finished.
ai-tika-abh08t20:10_0: The group of twenty is finished.
